subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Miracle Mets of 1969 never won another World Series. The swashbuckling champions of 1986 never won another pennant. So this team should enjoy the present, no matter how bright the future seems.
snippet: The Miracle Mets of 1969 never won another World Series. The swashbuckling champions of 1986 never won another pennant. So this team should enjoy the present, no matter how bright the future seems.
